description.narrative: Child rights governance system is further strengthened for mobilizing and supporting government, the legislature, civil society and children in advancing the rights of all children., which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Public Finance And Local Governance, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Equity-sensitive national policies, programmes and budget allocations are made based on high quality evidence and strengthened oversight

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Child rights governance system is further strengthened for mobilizing and supporting government, the legislature, civil society and children in advancing the rights of all children.

description.narrative: UNICEF has completed its technical support to the Department of Social Development (DSD) on the production of a new National Plan of Action for Children. UNICEF has also succeeded in hosting and participating in a number of high-level meetings with the Presidency (visit to Sweden on human rights for example) and members of Parliament (children's parliament and the annual Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement, which examines the document from a child perspective). Prior to the national elections, UNICEF signed a technical Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with Parliament to support professional and the political staff on a range of children-related topics. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/01/2020

title.narrative: Citizens (including children) empowered to participate in (sub)national budget process to improve budget transparency and accountability
